1.0.name: wordpress/bootstrap-collapse
1.0.description:
Bootstrap Collapse plugin will let you use Twitter Bootstrap Collapse plugin on wordpress with help of Short codes [bc_group] and [bc_collapse]

How to use?

[bc_group] [bc_collapse title="Title 1" open="y/n"]some text [/bc_collapse][bc_collapse title="Title 2" open="y/n"]some text[/bc_collapse][bc_collapse title="Title 3" open="y/n"]some text[/bc_collapse] [/bc_group]
